dcterms:creator: Evan Sandhaus
dcterms:description: The New York Times Annotated Corpus is a large-scale annotated dataset that provides a rich resource for various natural language processing tasks, including text summarization.
dcterms:title: NYT

dcterms:description: The CNNDM dataset is used for training and evaluating machine reading and comprehension models, particularly in the context of extractive summarization.
dcterms:title: CNNDM
